mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notice (nno, title, content, writer, regdate) VALUES (SEQ_NOTICE.NEXTVAL, #{title}, #{content}, #{writer}, SYSTIMESTAMP)
mapper.update: UPDATE notice SET title = #{title}, content = #{content}, modifieddate = SYSTIMESTAMP WHERE nno = #{nno}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM notice WHERE title LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' OR content LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' ORDER BY regdate DESC OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{limit} ROWS ONLY
SELECT nno, title, writer, regdate FROM notice ORDER BY nno DESC OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{limit} ROWS ONLY
SELECT nno, title, writer, regdate FROM notice ORDER BY regdate DESC FETCH FIRST #{limit} ROWS ONLY
